title: The weirdest spam message I've received so far
description:
It goes like this (excerpted):

Are your production models too big? Would you be interested in getting the same performance out of your LightGBM/XGBoost/Random Forest models but with 80% fewer features/explanatory variables?

Kindly click to respond: Yes Maybe No

We're approaching what I'd expect to read in a cyberpunk text. Pssst, I have this model here, want to try it?
dc:creator: José María Mateos
